titleStmt.title: To the King and Queens Most Excellent Majesties, the Lords spiritual and temporal, and to the Knights, citizens, and burgesses assembled in Parliament an humble proposal shewing how this nation may be vast gainers by all sums of mony given to the Crown without lessening the prerogative..
titleStmt.author: Killigrew, William, Sir, 1606-1695.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
This item is found at reel 1311:8 as Wing K459 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and at reel 1741:40 as Wing (2nd ed.) K471.
Reproductions of originals in the Cambridge University Library (reel 1311:8), and henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reel 1741:40).
